original_text: However, if payment is demanded, the owner may redeem his life by the payment of whatever is demanded.
korean_text: 만일 그에게 속죄금을 부과하면 무릇 그 명령한 것을 생명의 대가로 낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: the owner may redeem his life
sentences.korean_translation: 주인은 그의 생명을 속할 수 있으며

sentences.original_text: by the payment of whatever is demanded.
